Bash(gemini --all-files -p "Analyze this Spring Boot codebase to understand the Academic Affairs (giáo vụ) workflow for managing classes and students. Focus on:

1. Class List Workflow:
   - How academic affairs views class lists
   - Available filters (branch, course, status)
   - Information displayed for each class

2. Class Detail & Student List Workflow:
   - Navigation from class list to specific class
   - Detailed class information display
   - Current enrolled students list
   - Available actions

3. Branch Student Management Workflow:
   - How academic affairs views branch students
   - Search/filter capabilities
   - Student information display
   - Connection to enrollment workflow

For each workflow, identify:
- Existing controllers and endpoints
- Relevant entities and services
- Current queries and functionality
- Missing components that need implementation

Focus specifically on the academic affairs user role and their daily workflow. Include code examples of existing implementations and identify gaps that need to be filled.")
